name: Interactive Pet Toy
overview: Keep your pet engaged with this interactive toy designed to stimulate their mind.
long_description: Our interactive pet toy features dynamic movement and is designed to keep your pet engaged and active. It's great for mental stimulation and physical exercise, making it a must-have for energetic pets.
